data.message: I ALWAYS want to see the "Most Recent" posts.  I don't care what you think is the "Top Story".  Get rid of the "Trend" column and the "recommended pages".  I can tell that you are more interested in displaying ads (which make you money) than you are about the users needs.  It's all about the almighty dollar..... At least let us decide what we want to see and what we don't want to see by letting us close items and columns we don't use.  I think it's time for us to make a change to a new social network site.  Anyone know of any good ones?

replies.message: preferably one that has not undergone an IPO and now must answer to their investors by increasing profits. Just look at all the coercion changes FB has made to force us to look at their advertisers, and to make people pay money for their followers to see their posts!
Just remember, those advertisers are why you get FB for free.
facebook was free BEFORE it's IPO and it was better then, so save your snark.

I'm sorry but I loved Myspace, could make your own unique page the way you wanted it. I had family stuff on one side, my other stuff, angels and such on the other, had it all organized the way I wanted it to look. And could change my whole cover page instead of only part of it. Myspace use to rock. I may be only a few, but they let us do what we wanted to our own page.

Top Story...I LIKE. if not, I go on. It seems to be that NOBODY wants to know what is going on in the world! Afraid you might have to DO something and make a difference!!?? We all know FB people aren't reading 5 papers a day...otherwise they wouldn't be on FB ALL the time...
